name: The Scavenger
description:
Hi, i'm Sidnei and this is The Scavenger. 

This is the first game that i'm developing on my on. I have only the first stage at the moment, but i'm working to make more stages on the game. 

This idea came with the goal to train my skills and having a complete game in my portfolio. 

The game is simple and have the base machanics of any shooter 2d.  There's one thing in this Project that i admit: i really like to write about the Scavenger conversations and the Orion onborad computer, it's funny how they treat each other.

This is the 1.0 version of the game, so there are still many things to do. I'm developing more things and i'm going to upload these things here gradually.

If you are interested, follow the page and when the game has an update, you will know.

HOW TO PLAY

Unzip the file and run the Space Conqueror aplication. 

Commands:

Use the arrow keys or w/a/s/d to move the ship around the scene.

Space to shoot. 

PS: There's no limit screen yet, so be carefull to not go outside the câmera view!

PS2: I've don't add any sound yet to this Project :(

Comment on what you thing of the game or report a bug . 

:D
